file.name: site-zone-targeting.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - Site Zone Targeting
  description: Advertiser related Adzerk Management API
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: site-zone-targeting
    description: Manage Size/Zone Targeting
paths:
  '/v1/flight/{flightId}/sitezonetargeting':
    post:
      tags:
        - site-zone-targeting
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: flightId
          description: The Flight Id to create the Site Zone Targeting for
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                SiteId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  nullable: true
                ZoneId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  nullable: true
                IsExclude:
                  type: boolean
                  default: false
                  nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: The newly created Site/Zone Targeting
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/site-zone.yaml#/schemas/SiteZone'
  '/v1/flight/{flightId}/sitezonetargeting/{id}':
    parameters:
      - name: flightId
        description: The Flight Id to update the Site Zone Targeting for
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: id
        description: The Id of the Site Zone Targeting to update
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    put:
      tags:
        - site-zone-targeting
      operationId: update
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                SiteId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  nullable: true
                ZoneId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  nullable: true
                IsExclude:
                  type: boolean
                  default: false
                  nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: The newly updated Site/Zone Targeting
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/site-zone.yaml#/schemas/SiteZone'
    get:
      tags:
        - site-zone-targeting
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Site/Zone Targeting
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/site-zone.yaml#/schemas/SiteZone'
  '/v1/flight/{flightId}/sitezonetargeting/{id}/delete':
    parameters:
      - name: flightId
        description: The Flight Id to update the Site Zone Targeting for
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: id
        description: The Id of the Site Zone Targeting to update
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    get:
      tags:
        - site-zone-targeting
      operationId: delete
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully Deleted
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 139: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
